    NatalieHanman

    15 April 2009 6:11pm

    2

    I felt really sad to hear this news. I only read her more reflexive work on her experience of having cancer last year and found it incredibly powerful. Epistemology of the Closet is a fantastic, challenging read - especially her humourous and creative list of all the other possible ways of organising sexual variation beyond the gender of object choice (homosexual/heterosexual).
